Question & Options:
Which of the following statements are true regarding Chun-Li and the Street Fighter franchise?
Options:
A. a) Chun-Li is a character from the Street Fighter video game series.
B. b) The story of Chun-Li occurs before the events of the original Street Fighter.
C. c) The Legend of Chun-Li is a canonical film adaptation of the Street Fighter series.
D. d) The Legend of Chun-Li is related to the Street Fighter video game series.
Correct Answer: a) Chun-Li is a character from the Street Fighter video game series., b) The story of Chun-Li occurs before the events of the original Street Fighter., d) The Legend of Chun-Li is related to the Street Fighter video game series.
